concept.title: Importing Templates for the Provisioning of Resources

section.p: Apart from updating the configuration settings on the user interface of the OpenStack service controller, you can import templates for the provisioning of VMs into the bssapp database. These templates can be referenced in technical service definitions. The integration of OpenStack with supports the AWS CloudFormation Template and the Heat Orchestration Template.

ol.li: In a Web browser, access the URL of the OpenStack service controller, for example: http://127.0.0.1:8880/oscm-app-openstack.

Log in with the ID and password of the user specified in the configuration settings for the OpenStack service controller (BSS_USER_ID and BSS_USER_PWD) or as another technology manager registered for the same organization.

li.p: Click in the File name field or click Browse, and select the file containing the desired template.

section.p: If a template with the same name is imported twice, the original (first) one is replaced.
The provisioning service looks for the template with the name specified in the technical service definition (TEMPLATE_NAME service parameter) as follows:

ol.li: The template is searched for in the bssapp database.
If it is not found, the template is searched for in the location specified in the TEMPLATE_BASE_URLcontroller configuration setting.
